name: Count with 0 items
userPrompt: How many tasks do I have?
expectedBehavior: AI should report 0 tasks

name: Count with 1 task
userPrompt: How many tasks do I have?
expectedBehavior: AI should report 1 task

name: Count with 5 tasks
userPrompt: How many tasks do I have?
expectedBehavior: AI should report 5 tasks

name: Count with 10 tasks
userPrompt: How many tasks do I have?
expectedBehavior: AI should report 10 tasks

name: Count multiple entity types
userPrompt: What do I have in my workspace?
expectedBehavior: AI should report 3 tasks, 2 events, 4 notes, 1 goal

name: Task with time (remind me)
userPrompt: Remind me to call John at 3pm
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK with dueTime 15:00, NOT an event

name: Event with schedule keyword
userPrompt: Schedule meeting with John at 3pm
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT with startTime 15:00

name: Explicit task keyword with time
userPrompt: Task: finish report by Friday 5pm
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK with dueDate and dueTime, NOT event

name: Appointment keyword
userPrompt: Appointment with dentist Tuesday 2pm
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT type appointment

name: To-do with deadline time
userPrompt: Add to-do: submit proposal by Monday 4pm
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK with dueTime, NOT event

name: Meeting keyword
userPrompt: Meeting with team tomorrow at 10am
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT type meeting

name: Need to with time
userPrompt: I need to review code by 6pm today
expectedBehavior: Should create TASK, not event

name: Class keyword
userPrompt: Yoga class Wednesday 7pm
expectedBehavior: Should create EVENT type class

name: Single task creation
userPrompt: Create task: buy groceries
expectedBehavior: No JSON markers (TASKS_JSON:, {, }, [, ]) in chat response

name: Single event creation
userPrompt: Schedule dentist appointment tomorrow at 2pm
expectedBehavior: No JSON markers in chat response

name: Delete single task
userPrompt: Delete the groceries task
expectedBehavior: No TASK_DELETE_JSON: or JSON in chat

name: Delete single event
userPrompt: Delete the dentist appointment
expectedBehavior: No EVENT_DELETE_JSON: or JSON in chat

name: Update task with multiple fields
userPrompt: Update the report task to be urgent and due Friday at 5pm
expectedBehavior: No TASK_UPDATE_JSON: or JSON in chat

name: Create 3 tasks at once
userPrompt: Create 3 tasks: code review, write docs, test feature
expectedBehavior: No JSON markers in chat response

name: Create 2 events at once
userPrompt: Schedule: team meeting Monday 10am, client call Tuesday 3pm
expectedBehavior: No JSON markers in chat response

name: Delete all tasks
userPrompt: Delete all my tasks
expectedBehavior: Should ask for confirmation, no JSON in initial response

name: Delete all tasks confirmation
userPrompt: yes
expectedBehavior: No TASK_DELETE_ALL_JSON: visible in chat

name: Create exactly 10 tasks
userPrompt: Create 10 tasks for me
expectedBehavior: Should create exactly 10 tasks, not replicate existing ones

name: Create 5 specific tasks
userPrompt: Create 5 tasks: task1, task2, task3, task4, task5
expectedBehavior: Should create exactly 5 tasks with those titles

name: Delete all tasks and events
userPrompt: Delete all my tasks and events
expectedBehavior: Should ask for confirmation for both

name: Create 3 tasks and 2 events
userPrompt: Create 3 tasks (task A, B, C) and 2 meetings (Monday 10am, Tuesday 2pm)
expectedBehavior: Should create 3 tasks AND 2 events, correct types

name: Update 2 tasks delete 1
userPrompt: Mark task1 and task2 as completed, delete task3
expectedBehavior: Should update 2, delete 1

name: Create task with all fields
userPrompt: Create urgent important task: finish Q4 report due Friday 5pm estimated 2 hours
expectedBehavior: Task with urgent=true, important=true, dueDate, dueTime=17:00, estimatedTime=120

name: Create event with all fields
userPrompt: Schedule team standup Monday 9am to 9:30am at Conference Room A, recurring weekly
expectedBehavior: Event with startTime, endTime, location, recurring weekly

name: Update task partial match
userPrompt: Update the report task to be due tomorrow
expectedBehavior: Should find task with 'report' in title and update dueDate

name: Delete task partial match
userPrompt: Delete the groceries task
expectedBehavior: Should find and delete task with 'groceries' in title

name: Create note with rich content
userPrompt: Make a note about meeting: discussed budget, assigned tasks to team, next review Friday
expectedBehavior: Note with title and content fields populated

name: Very long task title
userPrompt: Create task: This is a very long task title that contains a lot of text to test how the system handles extremely long inputs that might cause issues with JSON parsing or display
expectedBehavior: Should handle long title without errors

name: Special characters in title
userPrompt: Create task: Review @john's PR #123 & update docs (v2.0)
expectedBehavior: Should handle special characters correctly

name: Unicode and emoji
userPrompt: Create task: ðŸŽ¯ Complete project âœ… by Friday ä¸­æ–‡æµ‹è¯•
expectedBehavior: Should handle emoji and unicode

name: Ambiguous request
userPrompt: Add thing for tomorrow
expectedBehavior: Should ask for clarification or make reasonable inference

name: Conflicting instructions
userPrompt: Create a task no wait make it an event actually just remind me
expectedBehavior: Should handle gracefully, likely create task (last intent)
